system:
note description: "Abstract interface for all pick and dropable classes.%NDescendants include: widgets, items and figures." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "pick and drop, figure, widget, item" date: "$Date: 2015-12-17 05:34:17 -0800 (Thu, 17 Dec 2015) $" revision: "$Revision: 98279 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_ABSTRACT_PICK_AND_DROPABLE
inherit FalseIDENTIFIED export {NONE} Falsefree_id, Falseid_freed, Falsedefault_create end
feature -- Access
f_pebble../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble: detachable FalseANY -- Data to be transported by pick and drop mechanism. deferred end
f_target_name../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_nametarget_name: detachable FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL -- Optional textual name describing Current pick and drop hole. note option: stable attribute end
f_target_data_function../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_data_functiontarget_data_function: detachable FalseFUNCTION [like ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble, ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xmlEV_PND_TARGET_DATA] -- Function for computing target meta data based on source pebble. -- Primarily used for Pick and Drop target menu. note option: stable attribute end
f_pebble_function../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebble_functionpebble_function: detachable FalseFUNCTION [detachable FalseANY] -- Returns data to be transported by pick and drop mechanism. deferred end
f_accept_cursor../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_accept_cursoraccept_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Result is cursor displayed when the screen pointer is over a -- target that accepts ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble during pick and drop. deferred ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_deny_cursor../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_deny_cursordeny_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Result is cursor displayed when the screen pointer is over a -- target that does not accept ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble during pick and drop. deferred ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
feature -- Status setting
f_set_pebble../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_pebbleset_pebble (a_pebble: like ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble) -- Assign a_pebble to ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble. require a_pebble_not_void: a_pebble /= Void deferred ensure pebble_assigned: ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble = a_pebble end
f_remove_pebble../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_remove_pebbleremove_pebble -- Make ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble Void and ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebble_functionpebble_function `Void, -- Removing transport. deferred ensure pebble_removed: ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble = Void and ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebble_functionpebble_function = Void end
f_set_pebble_function../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_pebble_functionset_pebble_function (a_function: FalseFUNCTION [detachable FalseANY]) -- Set a_function to compute ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble. -- It will be called once each time a pick occurs, the result -- will be assigned to ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble for the duration of transport. -- When a pick occurs, the pick position in widget coordinates, -- <<x, y>> in pixels, is passed. -- To handle this data use a_function of type -- FUNCTION [ANY, TUPLE [INTEGER, INTEGER], ANY] and return the -- pebble as a function of x and y. -- Overrides ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_pebbleset_pebble. require a_function_not_void: a_function /= Void a_function_takes_two_integer_open_operands: a_function.Falsevalid_operands ([1, 1]) deferred ensure pebble_function_assigned: ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebble_functionpebble_function = a_function end
f_set_target_name../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_target_nameset_target_name (a_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_name to ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_nametarget_name. require a_name_not_void: a_name /= Void do ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_nametarget_name := a_name.Falsetwin ensure target_name_assigned: attached ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_nametarget_name as l_target_name and then a_name /= l_target_name and then a_name.Falsesame_string (l_target_name) end
f_set_target_data_function../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_target_data_functionset_target_data_function (a_function: FalseFUNCTION [like ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble, ../interface/ev_pnd_target_data.xmlEV_PND_TARGET_DATA]) -- Set a_function to compute target meta data based on transport source. -- Overrides any ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_nametarget_name set with ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_target_nameset_target_name. require a_function_not_void: a_function /= Void do ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_data_functiontarget_data_function := a_function.Falsetwin ensure target_data_function_assigned: ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_data_functiontarget_data_function /= Void and then ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_target_data_functiontarget_data_function.Falseis_equal (a_function) end
f_set_accept_cursor../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_accept_cursorset_accept_cursor (a_cursor: detachable like ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_accept_cursoraccept_cursor) -- Set a_cursor to be displayed when the screen pointer is over a -- target that accepts ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble during pick and drop. deferred ensure accept_cursor_assigned: attached a_cursor as l_accept_cursor implies l_accept_cursor ~ ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_accept_cursoraccept_cursor end
f_set_deny_cursor../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_set_deny_cursorset_deny_cursor (a_cursor: detachable like ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_deny_cursordeny_cursor) -- Set a_cursor to be displayed when the screen pointer is not -- over a valid target. deferred ensure deny_cursor_assigned: attached a_cursor as l_deny_cursor implies l_deny_cursor ~ ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_deny_cursordeny_cursor end
feature -- User input events
f_pick_actions../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pick_actionspick_actions: ../interface/ev_pnd_start_action_sequence.xmlEV_PND_START_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pebblepebble is picked up. deferred end
f_conforming_pick_actions../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_conforming_pick_actionsconforming_pick_actions: ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when a pebble that fits this hole is -- picked up from another source. -- (when drop_actions.accepts_pebble (pebble)) deferred end
f_pointer_motion_actions../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pointer_motion_actionspointer_motion_actions: ../interface/ev_pointer_motion_action_sequence.xmlEV_POINTER_MOTION_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when screen pointer moves. deferred end
f_drop_actions../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_drop_actionsdrop_actions: ../interface/ev_pnd_action_sequence.xmlEV_PND_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to take when pick and drop transport drops on Current. deferred end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_ABSTRACT_PICK_AND_DROPABLE} -- Initialization
f_init_drop_actions../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_init_drop_actionsinit_drop_actions (a_drop_actions: ../interface/ev_pnd_action_sequence.xmlEV_PND_ACTION_SEQUENCE) -- Setup drop action sequence. local l_pnd_targets: FalseHASH_TABLE [FalseINTEGER_32, FalseINTEGER_32] l_object_id: like Falseobject_id do l_object_id := Falseobject_id l_pnd_targets := ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pnd_targetsPnd_targets a_drop_actions.Falsenot_empty_actions.Falseextend (agent l_pnd_targets.Falseput (l_object_id, l_object_id)) a_drop_actions.Falseempty_actions.Falseextend (agent l_pnd_targets.Falseremove (l_object_id)) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_interface_objects../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_create_interface_objectscreate_interface_objects do ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pnd_targetsPnd_targets.Falsedo_nothing end
f_pnd_targets../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_pnd_targetsPnd_targets: FalseHASH_TABLE [FalseINTEGER_32, FalseINTEGER_32] -- Hash table of current pnd targets. once Result := (create {../interface/ev_environment.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT}).../interface/ev_environment.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_environment_i.xml#f_application_iapplication_i.../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xml#f_pnd_targetspnd_targets end
f_default_pixmaps../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xml#f_default_pixmapsDefault_pixmaps: ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xmlEV_STOCK_PIXMAPS -- Default pixmaps and cursors. once create Result end

end -- class ../interface/ev_abstract_pick_and_dropable.xmlEV_ABSTRACT_PICK_AND_DROPABLE
